meanings.definition: A framework of wooden or metal studs used in the construction of walls.
meanings.sent1: The studwork supported the weight of the new wall.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter built the studwork before adding drywall.
meanings.sent3: The studwork decided to take a break from holding up walls.
meanings.sent4: The studwork stood strong like a fortress against the wind.
meanings.sent5: The studwork creaked under the pressure of the heavy shelves.

meanings.definition: The act or process of constructing with studs.
meanings.sent1: The studwork required precise measurements during construction.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of studwork while building the shed.
meanings.sent3: The studwork dance was all about precise movements and coordination.
meanings.sent4: His studwork in building the deck was admired by all.
meanings.sent5: The studwork progressed steadily as the project neared completion.

meanings.definition: The material used to create a framework of studs.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter purchased high-quality studwork for the project.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of studwork options for sale.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled paint on the new studwork.
meanings.sent4: The studwork gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its quality.
meanings.sent5: The studwork smelled of fresh wood, filling the room with a pleasant scent.
